body.p:
War Department
Washington City,
Dec 31 1863
Sir

I have the honor to acknowledge your communicatiion of the 21st inst in relation to the troops furnished by the State of Kentucky and the supposed discrepancy of account between this Department and the Military Authorities of your State.
In reply you have herewith a report upon the Subject by the Provost Marshal General which I trust will afford a satisfactory explanation.

With respect I am Your Obdt Servt
Edwin M Stanton
Sec of War
